CustomBehavior.Text:
You must be Level 90 with Wisdom of the Four Winds to use this profile.
Go to Pandaria then press Continue Profile.

IMPORANT: This profile assumes that you have completed all the required quests to avoid phasing issues.
For details refer to http://www.wowhead.com/achievement=7602#comments:id=1744893
Compiling Candy Bucket quest status...
Moving to Vale of Eternal Blossoms, Shrine of Two Moons

CustomBehavior.DestName: Vale of Eternal Blossoms, Shrine of Two Moons

CustomBehavior.Lua: local id,n=0; for b=0,4 do for s=1,GetContainerNumSlots(b) do id=GetContainerItemID(b,s) if (id == 37586) then ClearCursor() PickupContainerItem(b,s) DeleteCursorItem() end end end
for i=1,40 do name,_ = UnitAura("player", i) if (name == nil) then break end if (strfind(name, "Costume")) then CancelUnitBuff("player", i) end end
